Some of the games included:

Slenderman Must Die: The Asylum: You are a patient in a mental asylum who must escape the clutches of the Slenderman. The game is full of suspense and horror, and you will need to use all of your wits to survive. Navigate the eerie hallways and darkened rooms, all while the sinister presence of Slenderman looms ever closer. Can you outsmart the terror and find your way to freedom?

Slenderman Must Die: Silent Streets: You are a detective investigating a series of disappearances in a small town. The only clue you have is a series of strange symbols appearing all over town. As you delve deeper into the mystery, you come face to face with the Slenderman. Every step forward is a step into danger, and you must do everything you can to stay alive amidst the chilling encounters and eerie atmosphere.

Choo Choo Charles Revenge: You are a train conductor being hunted by a monstrous train called Choo Choo Charles. Use your wits and your train's weapons to survive this relentless pursuit. The game is full of action and suspense, requiring quick reflexes and strategic thinking to avoid being caught by the terrifying Choo Choo Charles. It's a high-speed nightmare on rails!

Horror Hide And Seek: You are a child playing hide and seek with your friends, but soon realize you are not alone. Something sinister is in the house with you, watching your every move. The game is a blend of suspense and horror, forcing you to use all your cunning and bravery to survive the unseen threat. Can you outsmart the lurking danger and find safety before it's too late?

Scary Baby in Yellow: You are a babysitter tasked with caring for a young child who is not what she seems. The child is a monster in disguise, intent on getting you. The game is filled with suspense and horror, challenging you to use all your wits to survive the night. Every moment is a test of nerves as you try to manage the monstrous child and stay one step ahead of the impending doom.

Siren Head 3: You are a police officer investigating strange occurrences in a small town, guided only by the eerie sounds echoing through the area. As you probe deeper, you encounter the formidable Siren Head. The game is a gripping tale of survival, requiring you to stay alert and resourceful to avoid becoming another victim of the sinister creature. Will you uncover the truth and escape alive?

Granny House: You are a young woman trapped in a haunted house, with the sinister Granny hot on your trail. The game is packed with suspense and horror, demanding quick thinking and sharp reflexes to avoid capture. Every creak and shadow heightens the tension as you navigate the perilous rooms and corridors. Can you outwit Granny and make your escape from the house of horrors?

Freddys Return Village Escape: You are a young man trapped in a village haunted by Freddy Krueger. To escape, you must outsmart the nightmarish fiend and find your way to safety. The game is saturated with suspense and horror, pushing you to use all your wits to survive the relentless terror. Every moment is a battle against fear and Freddy's unyielding pursuit. Will you break free from the nightmare and reclaim your freedom?
